desc:
Command function: Enter +N in the GM cell
Command Usage: `plus #N`

Command function: Input PD preset 3 2 3
Command Usage: `normal`

Command function: Select the cell 1 row up
Command Usage: `up`

Command function: Select the cell 1 row down
Command Usage: `down`

Command function: Select unfilled empty cell in the direction of progression
Command Usage: `resume`

Command function: Clear one input value and move to the previous cell
Command Usage: `backspace`

Command function: Clear all current inspection items in the selected cell
Command Usage: `clear`

Command function: Select previous cell
Command Usage: `back`

Command function: Select next cell
Command Usage: `next`

Command function: Repeat the last 3 values N times
Command Usage: `repeat`

Command function: Clear one input value and stay in the same cell
Command Usage: `discard`

Command function: Undo one action
Command Usage: `undo`

Command function: Redo one undone action
Command Usage: `redo`

Command function: Export to PMS (currently OpenDental)
Command Usage: `export`

Command function: Open the keypad window
Command Usage: `key pad on`

Command function: Close the keypad window
Command Usage: `key pad off`

Command function: Delete current chart
Command Usage: `delete`

Command function: Save current chart
Command Usage: `save`

Command function: Open preview modal window
Command Usage: `preview`

Command function: Stop voice control and transcription
Command Usage: `stop charting`

Command function: Stop voice control and transcription
Command Usage: `stop listening`

Command function: Stop voice control and transcription
Command Usage: `voice off`

Command function: Confirm
Command Usage: `yes`

Command function: Cancel
Command Usage: `no`

Command function: Close the popup window
Command Usage: `close`

Command function: Pause STT and maintain voice recognition status
Command Usage: `mute`

Command function: Pause STT and maintain voice recognition status
Command Usage: `pause`

Command function: Resume STT and maintain voice recognition status
Command Usage: `continue`

Command function: Create a new periodontal exam sheet for the selected patient
Command Usage: `create`

Command function: Close the popup window
Command Usage: `close`

Command function: Enter free text note
Command Usage: `free text`

Command function: Clear free text note
Command Usage: `clear text`

Command function: Select tooth #N
Command Usage: `tooth number`

Command function: Select tooth #N
Command Usage: `number`

Command function: Jump to tooth #N
Command Usage: `jump`

Command function: Enter PD value 0–19
Command Usage: `number #N, pocket depth #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter PD value 0–19
Command Usage: `nubmer #N, probing #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter GM value −19 to +19
Command Usage: `number #N, gingival margin #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter GM value −19 to +19
Command Usage: `number #N, recession #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter MGJ value 0–9
Command Usage: `number #N, mucogingival junction #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter Furc value 0, 1, 2, or 3
Command Usage: `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, #SURFACE_THRID, furcation #N`, `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, furcation #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter BOP value 0 or 1
Command Usage: `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, #SURFACE_THRID, bleeding #N`, `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, bleding #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter Sup value 0 or 1
Command Usage: `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, #SURFACE_THRID, suppuration #N`, `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, suppuration #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter Mob value 0, 1, 2, or 3
Command Usage: `number #N, mobility #N`

Command function: Enter Calc value 0 or 1
Command Usage: `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, #SURFACE_THRID, calculus`, `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, calculus #N #N #N`

Command function: Enter Plaq value 0 or 1
Command Usage: `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, #SURFACE_THRID, plaque`, `number #N, #SURFACE_DIRECTION, plaque #N #N #N`

Command function: Start voice control and transcription
Command Usage: `voice on`

Command function: Select the mesial lingual cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `mesial lingual of #N`

Command function: Select the mesial palatal cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `mesial palatal of #N`

Command function: Select the middle buccal cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `middle buccal of #N`

Command function: Select the middle lingual cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `middle lingual of #N`

Command function: Select the middle palatal cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `middle palatal of #N`

Command function: Select the distal buccal cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `distal buccal of #N`

Command function: Select the distal lingual cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `distal lingual of #N`

Command function: Select the distal palatal cell of tooth #N. This command selects SURFACE.
Command Usage: `distal palatal of #N`

Command function: Select the mesial cell of tooth #N.  This command selects #SURFACE_THRID.
Command Usage: `mesial of #N`

Command function: Select the middle cell of tooth #N.  This command selects #SURFACE_THRID.
Command Usage: `middle of #N`

Command function: Select the distal cell of tooth #N.  This command selects #SURFACE_THRID.
Command Usage: `distal of #N`

Command function: Select the buccal cell of tooth #N.  This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `buccal of #N`

Command function: Select the lingual cell of tooth #N.  This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `lingual of #N`

Command function: Select the palatal cell of tooth #N.  This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `palatal of #N`

Command function: Select cell at mesial of current tooth.  This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `number #N, mesial`

Command function: Select cell at middle of current tooth. This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `number #N, middle`

Command function: Select cell at distal of current tooth.  This command selects #SURFACE_THRID.
Command Usage: `number #N, distal`

Command function: Select cell at buccal of current tooth.  This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `number #N, buccal`

Command function: Select cell at lingual of current tooth. This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `number #N, lingual`

Command function: Select cell at palatal of current tooth. This command selects #SURFACE_DIRECTION.
Command Usage: `number #N, palatal`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to permanent
Command Usage: `number #N, permanent`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to missing
Command Usage: `number #N, missing`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to root remnant
Command Usage: `number #N, root rest`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to impacted
Command Usage: `number #N, impacted`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to implant
Command Usage: `number #N,implant`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to fixture
Command Usage: `number #N, fixture`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to crown
Command Usage: `number #N, crown`

Command function: Remove bridge status from selected tooth
Command Usage: `number #N, remove bridge`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to bridge
Command Usage: `number #N, number#N, bridge`. `number #N, #N, #N, bridge`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to pontic
Command Usage: `number #N, pontic`

Command function: Set selected tooth status to primary tooth
Command Usage: `number #N, primary teeth`

Command function: Deselect current tooth
Command Usage: `deselect`

Command function: Open the right-click menu for tooth status values
Command Usage: `menu`
